com.yantra.yfs.japi.ue

Interface YFSRecalculateHeaderTaxUE


  • public interface YFSRecalculateHeaderTaxUE

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      YFSExtnTaxCalculationOutStruct recalculateHeaderTax(YFSEnvironment env, YFSExtnHeaderTaxCalculationInputStruct inStruct)
      The YFSRecalculateHeaderTaxUE user exit can be used to recalculate the tax for the order at the header level.

    • Method Detail

      • recalculateHeaderTax

        YFSExtnTaxCalculationOutStruct recalculateHeaderTax(YFSEnvironment env,
                                                    YFSExtnHeaderTaxCalculationInputStruct inStruct)
                                             throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException

        The YFSRecalculateHeaderTaxUE user exit can be used to recalculate the tax for the order at the header level. This user exit is called at the Change Price order modification, when the shipping address changes, at invoicing, and at the calculation of release costs.

        Delayed Reauthorization

        When delayed Authorization is enabled, this user exit will be called if implemented to determine how to divide the header taxes on the order by the expected release dates of its lines.

        To code custom user exits, implement the method in this interface. The system calls the method in your class. If this method gives any exception, the current transaction is rolled back.


        Pre-conditions: This user exit is called:

        • for invoices
          • unconditionally
        • for releases
          • when PackListPriceInfo is in the template
        • for orders
          • when delayed authorization is enabled
          • under different modification conditions. See the createOrder and changeOrder javadocs for more information.

        Post-conditions: The order header tax is determined by the user extension.


        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inStruct - Required. For details on the input, see YFSExtnHeaderTaxCalculationInputStruct.


        Returns:
        outStruct For details on the output, see YFSExtnTaxCalculationOutStruct.


        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered. The transaction is aborted and changes are rolled back.
